results.title: Claude search
results.content: {"results": [{"title": "Enterprises must rethink IAM as AI agents outnumber humans 10 to 1", "content": "Article discussing how AI agents are transforming IAM - Microsoft's Entra ID handles 10,000 AI agents in single pilot programs while processing 8 billion authentications daily. Traditional IAM architectures can't scale to secure agentic AI. Discusses proximity-based authentication replacing hardware tokens, behavioral analytics for compromised agents, and zero trust scaling for agent proliferation. Cisco's Duo, Ping Identity's DaVinci, CrowdStrike Falcon, and Okta Advanced Server Access are mentioned.", "url": "https://venturebeat.com/security/identity-becomes-the-control-plane-for-enterprise-ai-security/"}, {"title": "Okta vs Microsoft Entra ID: Access Management Comparison", "content": "Practical comparison between Okta and Microsoft Entra ID. Okta offers smooth SSO across different apps and platforms, adaptive MFA with custom flows, detailed policy building, and flexible security
